title: On/Off Switch

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Protect a player each night. If you're on, you'll protect them with a Powerful attack, which actually doesn't protect them. If you're off, you'll protect them with Powerful defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At any time, you may turn yourself on or off. This affects your abilities.

desc:
Post 2521
***Off** is the best defense. Keep that in mind.*
